body:
Hi all,

I noticed that Octave package installation in macOS is possible with spack, so I thought it would be interesting to add that possibility to the wiki page:

https://wiki.octave.org/Octave_for_macOS

I left there a draft and I would like to ask you if you want to check it out and correct / update what I wrote.

ps: If you have a working version of Octave in macOS Catalina installed via spack, you can share that information, so that other users can know all working versions.

Cheers
title: Wiki Octave installation on MacOS with Spack
